description:
Did you know that pricing is the quickest and most effective way of increasing the profitability of your digital product? Whether you want to enjoy comfortable profits or want to gain additional profits to reinvest in your business, optimizing your price is your ultimate leverage to achieve your goals. Pricing is, quite simply, the most powerful marketing tool you have. And yet, very few business owners understand how to maximize their profits with effective pricing.

While pricing is the most effective method of increasing profits, it’s also one of the trickiest aspects of selling. Price too high and you’ll lose customers. Price too low and you’re selling yourself short. Either way, you’re leaving a sizable profit on the table. Profit you’ve already put in the work for.

Don’t be trapped by your competitors prices or misconceptions about pricing. Learn how to take complete control of your revenue stream. Then learn key customer leverage points that will allow you to command the price you set.

Decide today to be one of the few entrepreneurs that’s well-paid for the value you provide customers.

Pricing For Maximum Profit offers a practical, step-by-step approach to uncovering what your customers value most and how to quantify that value in order to arrive at an effective price. A price that both maximizes your profit and keeps customers happy.

In this course you’ll learn how to…

  • Increase passive profits with no additional effort (the work has already been done!)
  • Discover exactly what your potential customers are willing to pay
  • 2x or 3x your profits through long-term strategies
  • Determine whether you can increase profit through a price decrease or price increase
  • Leverage how customers perceive value to maximize both your profit and your marketing messages
  • Quantify the value of individual features
  • Quantify the true value of your product
  • Turn price-sensitive buyers into value-buyers to increase their willingness to pay
  • Create a powerful marketing message based on customer values
  • Use price to pre-empt competition and defend your market position
  • Increase volume of sales or the price of your product
  • Position yourself as an authority in your market
  • Use price to achieve: increased sales, higher-priced sales, and much more.

Pricing For Maximum Profit will completely dymystify how to optimize your price. No crazy mathematical formulas to work through. No complicated research methods. I’ve simplified all the complicated formulas I learned getting my B.A. in Economics. If you’ve passed 7th grade, you have all the skills you’ll need to optimize your price.

Simply follow this step-by-step blueprint to immediately increase your profitability. Set it and forget it: Earn increased revenue every month with zero effort. Not only will you get a clear path to determining your profit-maximizing price, but you’ll be walked through several practical pricing-research methods. On top of that, you’ll even get sample survey scripts. These are the EXACT questions I use for surveying customers. You can cut-and-paste these questions or alter them for your specific niche. You can know, FOR SURE, exactly what your customers are willing to pay for your product or for individual features in as little as 20 minutes!

Maximize your passive income today by Pricing For Maximum Profit!
title: Pricing For Maximum Profit: Make More From Digital Products
